brynn

Brynn is my name, and CSS is my game. By day I build human-centered Drupal websites and by night I get funky with CSS building over complicated, often unnecessary javascript-less projects (becasue whoever needed javascript). I’m current a developer at annex focused on building websites that people actually want to use.

recent work

Boxwow

github.com/Gumnutt/boxwow

Boxwow is a PHP application I created to assist with the creatation of pure CSS images constructed with box-shadows.

After spending many hours constructing images out of box-shadows I decieded there must be a better way. Long story short there was, and boxwow is it.
